Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.12127571]Newcastle disease virus (NDV):inhibition of syncytium formation between NDV-infected cells(IC50=3.27 μM)
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Mechanism of action: By binding to the opposite HR region in the F protein, peptides would inhibit fusion from the initial steps (lipid- and contents-mixing), blocking the conformational changes in the fusion protein required for triggering fusion.

Literature.Title: Mode of action of two inhibitory peptides from heptad repeat domains of the fusion protein of Newcastle disease virus.
Literature.Reference: Int J Biochem Cell Biol. 2002 Oct;34(10)1207-20.
Literature.Author: San Román K, Villar E, Muñoz-Barroso I.
